description: Forecasted pavement stress/condition for a road or pavement segment over a short horizon.

contents.name: segmentId
contents.description: ID of the associated RoadSegment or PavementSegment twin.

contents.name: generatedAtUtc
contents.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when this forecast was generated.

contents.name: horizonMinutes
contents.description: How far into the future this forecast applies (e.g., 5, 15, 60 minutes).

contents.name: predictedPavementStressIndex
contents.description: Predicted pavement stress index (higher = more stress, worse conditions).

contents.name: predictedConditionScore
contents.description: Optional 0â€“100 health score derived from stress index (100 = best condition).

contents.name: predictionMethod
contents.description: Short label describing how this forecast was generated (e.g. 'rf-regression-stress-next', 'rule-based').

contents.name: modelVersion
contents.description: Version tag of the ML model or rule set that produced this forecast.
